2023-24 Season Memberships are now on sale!
Join before June 1 for special perks such as our Members Only Pre-Sale.June 2 - Silver Member Pre-Sale (Package and Classical Subscription)June 13 - Bronze Member Pre-Sale (Package and Classical Subscription)August 8 - All Members Single Ticket Pre-Sale
 Are you wanting to experience the best The Soraya has to offer, with exclusive perks and benefits designed just for you? With Membership, you'll feel like a true VIP. Your discount on tickets is available year-round, making it easier than ever to see the artists you love or explore something new.

The Soraya Stage







						Director Selects: May 10 & 11 concerts double as “album release party" for Delirium Musicum
						
                


					
                        Sitting in a rehearsal of Delirium Musicum is intense. The company works tirelessly on every detail, sometimes repeating a single phrase of music dozens of times.
					

                    

Read more 














						Two New, ‘Now’ Ballets in World Premieres at The Soraya
						
                


					
                        It is a big, hopeful, nervous-making, celebratory event when a ballet has its world premiere. The preparation is immense, with many moving parts to orchestrate: choreography and rehearsals, of course,...
					

                    

Read more
